item.title: Computer Vision
item.description: 1-4 Harris corner detector：Robust against shift/rotation transformations and brightness changes. But Not robust against scale changes. LoG 图像 SIFT: Can handle changes in viewpoint and illumination SURF: fast / less sensitive to noise Nearest neighbor matching: One feature matches to another if those features are nearest neighbors and their distance is below some threshold. Canny edge detector Applying low- and high-pass filtering Non-maximum suppression Double thresholding SIFT key point Descriptor Construction in SIFT 2-1 RANSAC Hough Transform K-means Clustering Advantages Only One parameter need to choose (window size) Generic technique simple Drawbacks Selection of window size is important Does not scale well with dimension increase 大熊猫 2-2 2-3 uniqueness constraint ordering constraints depth from disparity effect of window size 3-1 Lucas-Kanade 3-2 Semantic segmentation vs Instance segmentation training and testing phases in statistical learning framework Nearest neighbor classifiers vs.
